title: Helped my friend get debit card of an interest based bank, am I sinful? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: came from india he says if i allowed a friend or directed a friend to buy through a debit card from a specific bank when i know that this debit card or this system that the bank is dealing with is reba based would i be sinful definitely yes you collaborated with him on how to obtain an interest-based loan and you directed him he said yeah this they give a little bit less this is better this is you should not have participated in such a thing
